document.full_text: three days of severe storms and tornadoes in the southern united states have killed at least 43 people, downing power lines and wrecking hundreds of buildings, officials said on sunday.
document.title: death toll at 43 as tornadoes, storms rake south
lines_and_colors: three days of severe storms and tornadoes in the southern united states have killed at least 43 people, downing power lines and wrecking hundreds of buildings, officials said on sunday.
